languages.text: {n}Соломон взирает на вас с откровенным сомнением.{/n} "Смелая версия, весьма. Но я бы поостерегся строить столь далеко идущие догадки".
{n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон взирает на вас с откровенным сомнением.{/n} "Смелая версия, весьма. Но я бы поостерегся строить столь далеко идущие догадки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt very clear.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory. But I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."
{n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt very clear.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory. But I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."
{n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

{n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."
{n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne blickt dich mit zweifelnder Miene an.{/n} "Eine gewagte Theorie, aber ich wäre mit solch kühnen Spekulationen vorsichtig."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne blickt dich mit zweifelnder Miene an.{/n} "Eine gewagte Theorie, aber ich wäre mit solch kühnen Spekulationen vorsichtig."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous lance un regard visiblement dubitatif.{/n} « C'est une théorie pour le moins originale, mais à votre place, j'éviterais de me livrer à des conjectures à la portée aussi considérable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous lance un regard visiblement dubitatif.{/n} « C'est une théorie pour le moins originale, mais à votre place, j'éviterais de me livrer à des conjectures à la portée aussi considérable. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは疑念を隠さずにあなたを見つめた。{/n}「確かに大胆な仮説ですが、そこまで踏み込んだ推測には注意が必要です」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは疑念を隠さずにあなたを見つめた。{/n}「確かに大胆な仮説ですが、そこまで踏み込んだ推測には注意が必要です」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne te mira con duda evidente en los ojos.{/n} «Desde luego es una teoría audaz, aunque no me atrevería a especular con algo tan grande».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne te mira con duda evidente en los ojos.{/n} «Desde luego es una teoría audaz, aunque no me atrevería a especular con algo tan grande».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙看着你，脸上带着毫不掩饰的怀疑。{/n}“这确实是个相当大胆的猜测，不过，我会对这种异想天开的猜测持保留态度。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙看着你，脸上带着毫不掩饰的怀疑。{/n}“这确实是个相当大胆的猜测，不过，我会对这种异想天开的猜测持保留态度。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, şüphesini belli edercesine sana bakıyor.{/n} "İddialı bir görüş. Şahsen böyle uçuk akıl yürütmelerden kaçınırdım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne looks at you, his doubt evident.{/n} "Certainly a bold theory, but I would be wary of such far-reaching speculations."
